name: Re ESTATE of Marjorie P. RODEL, Deceased

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Re ESTATE of Marjorie P. RODEL, Deceased.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: C. Dean Francis, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John C. Schmidt, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 128
Re ESTATE of Marjorie P. RODEL, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1980.
Decided May 16, 1980.
C. Dean Francis, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John C. Schmidt, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
